statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_id > 3
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY customer_id, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY customer_id, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, key_phrases FROM ProductAnalysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, key_phrases FROM ProductAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, aspect_sentiments -> 'quality' AS quality_sentiment FROM ProductAnalysis WHERE analysis_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY average_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, customer_id, review_rating FROM product_reviews ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE product_id = 100 OR recommended_product_id = 100;
SELECT count(*) AS total_recommendations FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date, customer_id FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT review_id, product_id, review_text, review_rating FROM product_reviews WHERE review_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE product_id = 20 AND recommended_product_id = 25;
SELECT recommendation_id, product_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM product_recommendations WHERE DATE(recommendation_date) = '2022-01-20';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT review_id, product_id, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%service%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 25 AND feedback_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM feedback_categories ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM product_feedback_mapping WHERE product_id = 201);
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customer;
SELECT product_name, launch_date FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Product;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN Customer ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = Customer.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, launch_date FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM FeedbackSentiment WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.6;

SELECT Product.product_name, Customer.customer_name FROM ProductFeedbackJoin JOIN Product ON ProductFeedbackJoin.product_id = Product.product_id JOIN CustomerFeedback ON ProductFeedbackJoin.feedback_id = CustomerFeedback.feedback_id;
